title: La Ronde = Circle of love
creator_credit: Roger Vadim, Raymond Hakim and Robert Hakim
brief_description: La Ronde is a romantic drama with an all-star cast lead by Jane Fonda, Jean Sorel and Catherine Spaak. It is set in pre-World War I Paris when the city was caught in a fever pitch of gaiety and affairs of the heart. Based on Arthur Schintzler’s famous stage play “Reigen”, the screenplay is given a fresh viewpoint by applying French psychology to the pursuit of love in its various forms. Dubbed in English.
